mapper.select: SELECT p.id AS product_id, p.id_category, p.productname, p.size, p.price, p.sale, p.quantity, p.status, p.title, p.highlight, p.product_new, p.detail, c.id_color, c.name_color, c.code, c.img, p.created_at, p.updated_at FROM product AS p JOIN product_color AS c ON p.id=c.product_id GROUP BY p.id, c.product_id

SELECT p.id AS product_id, p.id_category, p.productname, p.size, p.price, p.sale, p.quantity, p.status, p.title, p.highlight, p.product_new, p.detail, c.id_color, c.name_color, c.code, c.img, p.created_at, p.updated_at FROM product AS p JOIN product_color AS c ON p.id=c.product_id WHERE 1=1 AND p.product_new=true GROUP BY p.id, c.product_id ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 8

SELECT p.id, p.id_category, p.productname, p.size, p.price, p.sale, p.quantity, p.status, p.title, p.highlight, p.product_new, p.detail, c.id_color, c.name_color, c.code, c.img, p.created_at, p.updated_at FROM product AS p JOIN product_color AS c ON p.id=c.product_id WHERE 1=1 AND p.highlight=true GROUP BY p.id, c.product_id ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 6
